Action: Use LED bulbs/ tube-lights
Brief Description of Activity: Effective measures were taken to implement the action points planned for promotion and observance of Mission LiFE one-week focused campaign from 10-14 July in Embassy of India, Moscow. Posters (standies) were installed in all the 3 Embassy buildings and digital publicity was done by sharing Mission LiFE content on Mission website and social media handles to encourage adoption of healthy lifestyle, energy saving, water saving and waste reduction practices, and reduce use of single-use plastic. Mission LiFE videos were played on loop in visitor hall of the Consular Wing. Embassy was declared a plastic free zone. Flushes, taps and water pipes of the Embassy were checked for any leakage. Bins were installed at various locations in the Embassy. Trees were planted by the Ambassador in JNCC premises on 14 July 2023.

Action: Encourage use of millets in food and indigenous herbs and medicinal plants for nutrition and well being
Brief Description of Activity: A lecture on â€œDiseases in daily life and their protectionsâ€ delivered by Chief Guest Dr. D.S. Mertiya of AFRI Dispensary. During this program he provided detailed information about communicable and non-communicable diseases in human caused by the current lifestyle. To get rid of these diseases, the Dr. Mertiya told Yoga, Pranayama to be useful. He also answered various queries of the audience. Sh. M.R. Baloch, Director AFRI also expressed his views on the subject. Dr. Tarun Kant, GCR, Smt. Bhawana Sharma, HoD, Extension Division, all Scientist/Officers/Staff are present in this program. The coordination of program was done Smt. Kusum Parihar.

Brief Description of Activity: Head, Extension Division, RFRI delivered a presentation on 26-01-2023 on LiFE (Lifestyle for Environment) for sensitizing all the Scientists, Officers, Supporting & Ministerial Staff, Family Members and Children on various activities of LiFE Programme. He spoke about the aims and objectives, modus operandi and possible impact of LiFE Programme. He appealed to all for little change in our behavior and mindset to the environment friendly lifestyle. He elucidated seventy five actions to be followed by ourselves in our daily life for better world. He also mentioned about the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and informed that Mission LiFE contributes directly and indirectly to almost all the SDGs.

Brief Description of Activity: IOCL Paradip Refinery organised an event of â€œPloggingâ€ primarily of the plastic wastes at Mahanadi River Estuary, Paradip, Odisha for conserving the beaches and water bodies. Action: Do not discard waste in water bodies and in public spaces
Brief Description of Activity: Culmination of Navratris is observed with immersion of holy Sakh in running water as a sign of devotion to Goddess. This is popularly known as â€œSakh Visarjanâ€ and is traditionally done on Ashtami and Navmi or the last two days of Navratris. Visarjan of Sakh in holy Rivers / Canals, is thus, a popular event during the last two days of Navratris. During Sakh Visarjan, thousands of devotees throng Rivers to immerse the holy sakh along with every other Puja item, viz., chunri, havan samagri, flowers, old pictures and idols of gods / goddesses etc., lying with them since long.

Action: Practice segregation of dry and wet waste at homes
Brief Description of Activity: Workshop cum Quiz was conducted at Paradip Refinery Township on the topic â€œWaste Management, Water Conservation and Energy Conservationâ€. Township ladies and children participated in this workshop. Lectures were given by professionals in the above mentioned fields. Various topics were covered on waste management techniques, water and energy conservation. Quiz was conducted on these topics ans prizes were distributed. Bio composting methods were demonstrated with demo models, which can be implemented at home for effective composting.

Action: Repair, reuse and recycle old furniture
Brief Description of Activity: As a part of World environment day 2023 and Mission LiFE program, awareness programme was organized at Indane bottling plant, Cochin - Nadaakkavu Po. On 5th and 6th of June,2023.  The programme was conducted with a theme â€œSolution to Plastic Pollutionâ€ with an aim of promoting reduce, reuse and recycle. Programme was inaugurated by Plant Manger Smt. Remya Kenguva, DGM(Plant). After that importance of Environment, theme of WED-2023 and Mission LiFE were briefed to the gathering by Plant Manager. DSO Mr. Sreejith  K administered pledge to all the people.  As  a part of the program Sapling was also planted. Sapling and seed balls distributed to all who gathered. More than 150 saplings were distributed in the event.

Action: Use agricultural residue, animal waste for composting, manuring and mulching
Brief Description of Activity: As a part of World environment day 2023 and Mission LiFE program, awareness programme was organized at Indane bottling plant, Cochin - Nadaakkavu Po. On 5th and 6th of June,2023.  The programme was conducted with a theme â€œSolution to Plastic Pollutionâ€ with an aim of promoting reduce, reuse and recycle. Programme was inaugurated by Plant Manger Smt. Remya Kenguva, DGM(Plant). After that importance of Environment, theme of WED-2023 and Mission LiFE were briefed to the gathering by Plant Manager. Following inauguration pledge was administered to all the people.  As a part of the program Sapling was also planted. As a first time initiative planting was carried out in waste drums.  Sapling and seed balls distribution was arranged, more than 150 saplings were distributed in the event.
